competitions.title: Swin - Hackathon 2026
competitions.description: Brings people and AI solutions together to build a better world.
competitions.rules: Follow the official rules and regulations. No plagiarism. All submissions must be original work.

competitions.title: Performative Male
competitions.description: Who gonna be best performative S-Winners
competitions.rules: Wear best.

competitions.title: MisChef
competitions.description: Chefchoice competition for the best dishes
competitions.rules: Wear best.

competitions.title: AI Innovation Challenge
competitions.description: Create innovative AI solutions for real-world problems
competitions.rules: Must use ethical AI practices. Open-source solutions preferred. Team size 2-4 members.

competitions.title: SwinBiz Rockstar
competitions.description: Pitch your startup idea to win funding and mentorship
competitions.rules: Original business ideas only. 5-minute pitch presentation. Q&A session included.

competitions.title: Digital Media Showcase
competitions.description: Showcase your creative digital media projects
competitions.prizes: Best Overall: $800, Category Winners: $300 each, Adobe Creative Suite licenses
competitions.rules: Original content only. Multiple categories available. Submit in standard formats.

competitions.title: Code Sprint 2025
competitions.description: 48-hour coding marathon to solve algorithmic challenges
competitions.rules: Individual competition. Any programming language allowed. No external help.

competitions.title: Photography Walk
competitions.description: Capture the essence of your campus through photography
competitions.prizes: Best Photo: 500k VND voucher, Runner-up: 300k VND voucher, Certificates
competitions.rules: DSLR or smartphone photography allowed. Edit photos with credit. No stock images.

competitions.title: Debate Championship
competitions.description: Annual inter-campus debate competition on contemporary issues
competitions.prizes: Winning Team: 200 GOLD each + Trophy, Best Speaker: 100 GOLD + Certificate
competitions.rules: British Parliamentary format. 3 members per team. Professional judging panel.

competitions.title: Mobile App Development Contest
competitions.description: Build the next breakthrough mobile application
competitions.rules: iOS or Android. Original apps only. Must include documentation and demo video.

competitions.title: Marketing Case Competition
competitions.description: Solve real marketing challenges from industry partners
competitions.rules: Teams of 4. Real client cases. 24-hour preparation time. Professional presentation required.

competitions.title: Short Film Festival
competitions.description: Create and showcase your short film masterpiece
competitions.prizes: Best Film: $1200 + Film Equipment, Best Director: 150 GOLD, Audience Choice: 100 GOLD
competitions.rules: Maximum 15 minutes. Any genre. Original content only. Credits required.

competitions.title: Data Science Challenge
competitions.description: Analyze datasets and extract meaningful insights
competitions.prizes: 1st: 250 GOLD + Cloud Credits, 2nd: 150 GOLD, 3rd: 75 GOLD + Certificates
competitions.rules: Use provided datasets. Python/R preferred. Submit Jupyter notebooks. Code review required.

competitions.title: Talent Show Extravaganza
competitions.description: Show off your unique talents and skills
competitions.prizes: Winner: 1M VND voucher Shopee, 2nd: 500k VND, 3rd: 300k VND + Certificates
competitions.rules: 5-minute performance. Any talent welcome. Clean content only. Backup music on USB.

competitions.title: Sustainability Innovation Lab
competitions.description: Design sustainable solutions for environmental challenges
competitions.rules: Focus on sustainability. Feasible solutions. Prototype preferred. Impact assessment required.

competitions.title: Esports Championship
competitions.description: Compete in League of Legends, Valorant, and CS2
competitions.prizes: Per Game - 1st: 300 GOLD + Gaming Peripherals, 2nd: 150 GOLD, 3rd: 75 GOLD
competitions.rules: Team of 5. Standard tournament rules. No cheating. Streaming encouraged.

competitions.title: Podcast Creation Workshop
competitions.description: Learn to create and produce professional podcasts
competitions.prizes: Best Podcast: Audio Equipment Bundle, Runner-up: 100 GOLD, All: Certificates
competitions.rules: Create 10-15 minute episode. Any topic (appropriate). Team or solo. Professional editing required.

competitions.title: Cybersecurity CTF
competitions.description: Capture the flag competition for aspiring security professionals
competitions.rules: Ethical hacking only. No DoS attacks. Document your approach. Learn and have fun.

competitions.title: Creative Writing Contest
competitions.description: Express yourself through short stories and poetry
competitions.prizes: 1st: 800k VND + Publication, 2nd: 500k VND, 3rd: 300k VND + Feedback Session
competitions.rules: Max 3000 words for stories, 50 lines for poetry. Original work. English or Vietnamese.

competitions.title: Investment Challenge
competitions.description: Virtual stock trading competition with real market data
competitions.rules: Virtual $100K portfolio. Real-time data. Weekly reports required. Ethical trading only.

competitions.title: 3D Modeling Challenge
competitions.description: Create stunning 3D models and animations
competitions.prizes: 1st: Blender Pro Training + 150 GOLD, 2nd: 100 GOLD, 3rd: 50 GOLD
competitions.rules: Any 3D software. Original models only. Render required. Optional animation bonus.

competitions.title: Robotics Competition
competitions.description: Design and program autonomous robots
competitions.rules: Build autonomous robot. Size restrictions apply. Safety first. Documentation required.

competitions.title: Speed Networking Night
competitions.description: Connect with students and professionals across disciplines
competitions.prizes: Free refreshments, LinkedIn Premium trial, Networking cards
competitions.rules: Professional attire. Bring business cards. 3-minute rotations. Respectful networking.

competitions.title: Graphic Design Showdown
competitions.description: Design competition across multiple categories
competitions.prizes: Category Winners: 120 GOLD each, Grand Prize: $1000 + Adobe CC License
competitions.rules: Original designs. Multiple categories. High-resolution files. Source files required.

competitions.title: Innovation Bootcamp
competitions.description: Intensive workshop on design thinking and innovation
competitions.rules: Team-based. Real problems. Prototype required. Pitch presentation. Industry judging.

competitions.title: Chess Tournament
competitions.description: Classical chess competition for all skill levels
competitions.prizes: 1st: 150 GOLD + Chess Set, 2nd: 100 GOLD, 3rd: 50 GOLD + Books
competitions.rules: FIDE rules. Swiss system. Time control: 15+10. Fair play monitoring.

competitions.title: Web Development Sprint
competitions.description: Build a full-stack web application in 72 hours
competitions.rules: Any tech stack. Functional app required. Deploy to cloud. Code review included.

competitions.title: Cooking Battle
competitions.description: MasterChef-style cooking competition
competitions.prizes: Winners: 1.5M VND Grab Food voucher, 2nd: 1M VND, 3rd: 500k VND
competitions.rules: Mystery basket challenge. 90 minutes cooking time. Food safety first. Professional judging.

competitions.title: Social Media Campaign Challenge
competitions.description: Create viral social media campaigns for real brands
competitions.rules: Real engagement metrics. Ethical practices. Platform diversity. Analytics report required.

competitions.title: Documentary Film Challenge
competitions.description: Create impactful documentary short films
competitions.rules: 10-20 minutes length. Social issues focus. Interviews required. Fact-checking mandatory.

competitions.title: IoT Hackathon
competitions.description: Build smart IoT solutions for everyday problems
competitions.rules: Working prototype required. Use sensors/actuators. Safety certified. Demo presentation.

competitions.title: Stand-up Comedy Night
competitions.description: Open mic comedy show for aspiring comedians
competitions.prizes: Audience Favorite: 400k VND, 2nd: 250k VND, All: Open Mic Experience
competitions.rules: 5-7 minute set. Clean humor preferred. Original material. Respectful content only.

competitions.title: Environmental Photo Contest
competitions.description: Capture the beauty and challenges of our environment
competitions.prizes: Grand Prize: Camera Equipment + 180 GOLD, Category Winners: 80 GOLD each
competitions.rules: Environmental theme. Original photos. Multiple categories. Caption required.

competitions.title: Blockchain Innovation Challenge
competitions.description: Develop blockchain solutions for real-world applications
competitions.rules: Smart contracts required. Security audit needed. White paper mandatory. Demo on testnet.

competitions.title: Business Plan Competition
competitions.description: Pitch your comprehensive business plan to investors
competitions.rules: Detailed business plan. Market research required. Financial projections. 15-min pitch.

competitions.title: Music Production Contest
competitions.description: Produce original tracks across various genres
competitions.prizes: Best Track: Studio Time + 200 GOLD, Genre Winners: 100 GOLD each
competitions.rules: Original production. Multiple genres. WAV/FLAC format. Stems required for finalists.

competitions.title: Trivia Quiz Night
competitions.description: Test your knowledge across multiple categories
competitions.rules: Teams of 4. Multiple rounds. No phones. Tie-breaker questions. Good sportsmanship.

competitions.title: UX/UI Design Challenge
competitions.description: Design exceptional user experiences for mobile apps
competitions.rules: Mobile-first design. Prototype required. User testing documentation. Accessibility considered.

competitions.title: Sustainability Pitch Night
competitions.description: Pitch eco-friendly business ideas to green investors
competitions.rules: Sustainability focus. Carbon footprint analysis. Scalability plan. Impact metrics.

competitions.title: Animation Showcase
competitions.description: Create stunning 2D or 3D animations
competitions.rules: 30-120 seconds. 2D or 3D. Original characters. Sound design included. Story-driven.

competitions.title: Machine Learning Olympics
competitions.description: Compete in ML challenges across various domains
competitions.prizes: Grand Champion: $2200 + GPU Credits, Category Winners: 150 GOLD each
competitions.rules: Multiple ML challenges. Jupyter notebooks. Model interpretation. Ethical AI practices.

competitions.title: Dance Competition
competitions.description: Showcase your best dance moves - solo or group
competitions.prizes: Best Group: 2M VND, Best Solo: 1M VND, Audience Choice: 500k VND
competitions.rules: 3-5 minutes performance. Any dance style. Appropriate music. Costumes encouraged.

competitions.title: Product Design Sprint
competitions.description: Design innovative products from concept to prototype
competitions.rules: User-centered design. Rapid prototyping. User testing. Pitch presentation. Feasibility study.
